New Records: Glenn Maxwell equalled the record for the most T20I centuries with his fifth hundred, matching India’s Rohit Sharma
Key Match Events: A bizarre near-run-out incident involving Alzarri Joseph, with on-field umpire Gerard Abood initially denying the appeal but TV replays confirming the decision
Post-Match Reflections: Australia clinched the series 2-0 with one match remaining, highlighting their dominance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Maxwell’s performance included 8 sixes and 12 fours, while West Indies’ players like Rovman Powell and Andre Russell contributed significantly but fell short
